Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $120. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer tailored for potential early adopters like yourself. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring the benefits of this product further or if you have any questions. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
